name: Adventuring Time
desc: Discover every biome

name: Arbalistic
desc: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

name: Sneak 100
desc: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you

name: Blowback
desc: Kill a Breeze with a deflected Breeze-shot Wind Charge

name: Brush Armadillo
desc: Get Armadillo scutes from brushing an Armadillo.

name: Bullseye
desc: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

name: Careful Restoration
desc: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds

name: Crafters Crafting Crafters
desc: Be near a Crafter when it crafts a Crafter.

name: Caves & Cliffs
desc: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive

name: Hero of the Village
desc: Successfully defend a village from a raid

name: Sticky Situation
desc: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

name: Monster Hunter
desc: Kill any hostile monster

name: Monsters Hunted
desc: Kill one of every hostile monster

name: It Spreads
desc: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst

name: Lighten Up
desc: Scrape a Copper Bulb with an Axe to make it brighter.

name: Surge Protector
desc: Protect a Villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire

name: Minecraft Trials Edition
desc: Enter a Trial Chamber.

name: Ol' Betsy
desc: Shoot a Crossbow

name: Over-Overkill
desc: Deal 50 hearts of damage in a single hit using the mace.

name: Sound of Music
desc: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a Jukebox

name: The Power of Books
desc: Read the power signal of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a Comparator

name: Revaulting
desc: Unlock a Vault with a Trial Key.

name: Respecting the Remnants
desc: Brush a Suspicious block to obtain a Pottery Sherd

name: Take Aim
desc: Shoot something with an Arrow

name: Sweet Dreams
desc: Sleep in a Bed to change your respawn point

name: Sniper Duel
desc: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away

name: Is It a Plane?
desc: Look at the Ender Dragon through a Spyglass

name: Is It a Balloon?
desc: Look at a Ghast through a Spyglass

name: Is It a Bird?
desc: Look at a Parrot through a Spyglass

name: Hired Help
desc: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

name: A Throwaway Joke
desc: Throw a Trident at something.

name: Postmortal
desc: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

name: What a Deal!
desc: Successfully trade with a Villager

name: Star Trader
desc: Trade with a Villager at the build height limit

name: Smithing with Style
desc: Apply these smithing templates at least once: Spire, Snout, Rib, Ward, Silence, Vex, Tide, Wayfinder

name: Crafting a New Look
desc: Craft a trimmed armor at a Smithing Table

name: Two Birds, One Arrow
desc: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing Arrow

name: Under Lock and Key
desc: Unlock an Ominous Vault with an Ominous Trial Key.

name: Country Lode, Take Me Home
desc: Use a Compass on a Lodestone

name: Very Very Frightening
desc: Strike a Villager with lightning

name: Voluntary Exile
desc: Kill a raid captain.

name: Light as a Rabbit
desc: Walk on Powder Snow... without sinking in it

name: Who Needs Rockets
desc: Use the wind charge to launch yourself 8 blocks upwards.

name: Who's the Pillager Now?
desc: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

name: Heart Transplanter
desc: Place a Creaking Heart with the correct alignment between two Pale Oak Log Blocks.

name: You Need a Mint
desc: Collect Dragon's Breath in a Glass Bottle

name: The Next Generation
desc: Hold the Dragon Egg

name: Sky's the Limit
desc: Find Elytra

name: Remote Getaway
desc: Escape the island

name: The City at the End of the Game
desc: Go on in, what could happen?

name: Free the End
desc: Good luck

name: Great View From Up Here
desc: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker

name: The End... Again...
desc: Respawn the Ender Dragon

name: Birthday Song
desc: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block

name: You've Got a Friend in Me
desc: Have an Allay deliver items to you

name: The Cutest Predator
desc: Catch an Axolotl in a Bucket

name: A Balanced Diet
desc: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

name: Two by Two
desc: Breed all the animals!

name: The Parrots and the Bats
desc: Breed two animals together

name: A Complete Catalogue
desc: Tame all Cat variants!

name: Little Sniffs
desc: Feed a Snifflet

name: Fishy Business
desc: Catch a fish

name: With Our Powers Combined!
desc: Have all Froglights in your inventory

name: The Healing Power of Friendship!
desc: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight

name: When the Squad Hops into Town
desc: Get each Frog variant on a Lead

name: Glow and Behold!
desc: Make the text of any kind of sign glow

name: Serious Dedication
desc: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a Hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices

name: Smells Interesting
desc: Obtain a Sniffer Egg

name: Planting the Past
desc: Plant any Sniffer seed

name: A Seedy Place
desc: Plant a seed and watch it grow

name: Remove Wolf Armor
desc: Use Shears to remove armor from a Wolf.

name: Repair Wolf Armor
desc: Use Armadillo Scutes to repair a Wolf's armor.

name: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
desc: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat

name: Bee Our Guest
desc: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Glass Bottle without aggravating the Bees

name: Total Beelocation
desc: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 Bees inside, using Silk Touch

name: Tactical Fishing
desc: Catch a Fish... without a Fishing Rod!

name: Bukkit Bukkit
desc: Catch a Tadpole in a Bucket

name: Best Friends Forever
desc: Tame an animal

name: Wax Off
desc: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!

name: Wax On
desc: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!

name: Whole Pack
desc: Tame one of each Wolf variant.

name: Stay Hydrated!
desc: Place a Dried Ghast block into water.

name: How Did We Get Here?
desc: Have every effect applied at the same time

name: A Furious Cocktail
desc: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

name: Local Brewery
desc: Brew a Potion

name: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
desc: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum

name: Beaconator
desc: Bring a Beacon to full power

name: Bring Home the Beacon
desc: Construct and place a Beacon

name: Oh Shiny
desc: Distract Piglins with gold

name: Hot Tourist Destinations
desc: Explore all Nether biomes

name: Subspace Bubble
desc: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld

name: Those Were the Days
desc: Enter a Bastion Remnant

name: A Terrible Fortress
desc: Break your way into a Nether Fortress

name: Spooky Scary Skeleton
desc: Obtain a Wither Skeleton's skull

name: War Pigs
desc: Loot a Chest in a Bastion Remnant

name: Cover Me in Debris
desc: Get a full suit of Netherite armor

name: Hidden in the Depths
desc: Obtain Ancient Debris

name: Into Fire
desc: Relieve a Blaze of its rod

name: Who is Cutting Onions?
desc: Obtain Crying Obsidian

name: Return to Sender
desc: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball

name: This Boat Has Legs
desc: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick

name: Feels Like Home
desc: Take a Strider for a loooong ride on a lava lake in the Overworld

name: Withering Heights
desc: Summon the Wither

name: Uneasy Alliance
desc: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it

name: Zombie Doctor
desc: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager

name: The End?
desc: Enter the End Portal

desc: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal

desc: Follow an Eye of Ender

desc: Obtain a block of Obsidian

desc: Upgrade your Pickaxe

name: Hot Stuff
desc: Fill a Bucket with lava

name: Diamonds!
desc: Acquire diamonds

name: Stone Age
desc: Mine Stone with your new Pickaxe

name: Suit Up
desc: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor

name: Cover Me with Diamonds
desc: Diamond armor saves lives

desc: Smelt an Iron Ingot
